products.description:
EVEN OUT UNEVEN SKIN TONE — Unlock the power of a transparent collagen jelly cream designed to specifically target and target uneven skin tone. Reveal a more harmonious, luminous complexion for a naturally smooth and radiant look.
PRODUCT BENEFITS — Quickly reveals a more radiant, refreshed complexion with the ‘Korean Glass Glow’ effect post-application. Dermatologist-tested, low-irritating, silicone-free, maintains a skin-friendly pH of 5.69–7.69, and is free from artificial color.

products.product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream, Body and Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Body Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides, Daily Moisturizer, Oil-Free, Fragrance Free, Non-Comedogenic, 19 Ounce
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II) and hyaluronic acid. This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body Featuring our patented MVE Technology to release a steady stream of moisturizing ingredients throughout the day and night.
•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Oil-free•Hypoallergenic•Gentle, non-irritating formula•Suitable for sensitive skin
Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
features: [ HYALURONIC ACID MOISTURIZER ] With hyaluronic acid, ceramides and MVE technology for 24 hour hydration. Rich, velvety texture that leaves skin feeling smooth, it is absorbed quickly for softened skin without greasy, sticky, feel.

[ MOISTURIZER FOR DRY SKIN ] A deficiency of ceramides in skin can often be associated with dry skin, which can feel itchy and look flaky. CeraVe Moisturizing Cream is formulated with three essential ceramides & hyaluronic acid.

[ GENTLE DAILY MOISTURIZER ] For face and body or can be used as a hand cream for dry skin relief. Holds National Eczema Association (NEA) Seal of Acceptance. Fragrance free, paraben free, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

products.description: Choco Musk is not just a fragrance; it's a delicate dance of sweet shades that captivates the senses. The delightful aroma begins with the chic allure of white musk, falling under the spell of incomparable white chocolate. Each note in the composition complements the other, creating a harmonious blend that emphasizes without overwhelming. As the fragrance unfolds, the middle notes gently merge, introducing spicy cinnamon, creamy vanilla, and the enchanting essence of rose. The base notes add a touch of oriental mystique, with exciting amber and myrrh weaving together with a noble sandalwood tint. The result is a sweet harmony that plays with shades of dessert perfumes in all their splendor. Choco Musk is a delicacy that transcends seasons, inviting you into a fairy-tale captivity of sweet indulgence. Whether it's the warmth of summer or the coziness of winter, let this fragrance be your year-round temptation, teasing and charming those around you. The 50ml Eau de Parfum bottle is an elegant testament to the luxurious experience that awaits you. With its refined design, it complements the richness of the fragrance within, enhancing the overall indulgence. Choco Musk isn't just a fragrance; it's a captivating tale of sweet temptation. Let it be your daily indulgence, a sensory journey into the heart of dessert-inspired luxury.

Base Notes: Myrrh, Amber And Spicy Notes

products.product_name: Beetles 2 Pcs 15ml No Wipe Gel Top Coat and Base Coat Set - Shine Finish and Long Lasting Soak Off LED Nail Lamp Gel Base Top Coat Finish Nail Art Design Manicure Gifts for Women
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Foot, Hand & Nail Care > Nail Art & Polish > Base & Top Coats > Combination Base & Top Coats
products.description:
Beetles No Wipe Top Coat and Base Coat: Enjoy long-lasting wear for over 28 days with a perfect shine. The flexible top coat prevents nicks, chips, and smudges. Tip: The base coat is designed to remain sticky, providing a solid foundation for the next coat of polish. (Note: The base gel should not be used as glue.)
High-Quality and Protective: Beetles Glossy No Wipe Top Coat and base, with proper application, can last with a perfect shine. The flexible top coat avoids nicks, chips, or smudges. Ideal Mother's Day gifts for her. Tips: Avoid touching your nails after curing the top coat for 2 minutes to enhance the shine.
Easy Application and Good Tenacity:If you have sensitive skin, we recommend using this product in conjunction with Liquid Peel off Latex Tape. This tape minimizes direct skin contact with the gel, reducing the chance of allergic reactions. It also helps in achieving more precise nail art. Please note that Liquid Peel off Latex Tape is not included with this product and must be purchased separately.
Reminder: In low temperatures, the base coat may become clumpy or thick, which can cause the brush to break off inside the bottle. If this happens, please contact us for satisfactory after-sales service. Tip: There's no need to wipe off the tacky residue of the base coat, as it helps the color coat adhere longer to your nails.If you feel a burning sensation during curing, it is recommended to remove your hand from the lamp. Resume curing once the sensation returns to normal.
Tips for preventing nail surface peeling off:(1) Polishing of the nail surface: Polish the front, side and trailing edge of the nail until there are no reflective spots on the nail surface(2) Nail surface cleaning: It is recommended to use Nail dehydrator to remove oil and moisture from the nail surface(3)Lighting time: It is recommended that the lighting time for base Coat, Color Gel and Top Coat at least 60 seconds.

Fast-Acting Foot Callus Remover - See results in just 3 to 5 minutes. Perfect for pairing with a foot soak, bath, or tub—simply apply and gently buff with your favorite foot scrubber or pumice stone for instantly smoother heels and soles.
New Precision Applicator + Gloves Included - Our upgraded nozzle allows for clean, targeted application—no drips, no mess. Plus, we include protective gloves with every bottle so you can safely apply the gel with confidence and control.
Advanced Formula for Tough, Dry Skin - Powered by skin-renewing ingredients like mint and glycerin, this potent gel penetrates thick, dry layers to break down stubborn calluses. Leaves feet feeling soft, refreshed, and sandal-ready.
Product Ingredients: Water, glycerin, mint, fragrance.

products.description:

The large amount will support you to fulfill a number of your wonderful DIY decoration ideas.
💎VIBRANT GEMS FOR CRAFTS -- Made of choice resin, these crystals are lightweight, durable, and economical. The AB coating is firmly combined on the outer surface of each rhinestone, which can have different color performances under different light or different refraction angles, providing long-lasting sparkle. Their perfect cutting facets, delicate and exquisite shine will make your handicrafts more dazzling and eye-catching.
💎B7000 CLEAR GLUE FOR GEMS -- Our B7000 glue has strong adhesion and dries clear, non-toxic and harmless to the skin.The glue has a precision needle for easy application, initial cure time is 3-5 minutes and full cure time is 24 hours. 💎WIDE APPLICATION -- These sparkling iridescent resin rhinestones are perfect for creating dazzling looks. Use them for bedazzling crafts or nail art and more. Apply it to what you want to bling!
💎HIGHLIGHTS -- Our store also offers a variety of colors and sizes of resin rhinestones, these colors will give your crafts more possiblities, more shiny color scheme. A sufficient amount of resin gems are suitable for paving large area designs such as diamond paintings or cups. By choosing resin rhinestones with similar or contrasting colors, you can create color-coordinated or highly contrasting works, such as phone cases with gradient effect or colourful festival decorations.

products.product_name: BASED Hair Texturizing Powder, Lightweight & Volumizing Hair Styling Powder with Matte Finish, Add Texture to Hair with Medium Hold, For Short to Medium Hair, (1.69oz Bottle, 2.5 Gram Fill, Pack of 1)

SHORT TO MEDIUM HAIR TYPE: To provide proper hold and volume, our texture powder is best for hair under 6 inches in length.

CONVENIENT SPRAY BOTTLE DESIGN: The spray bottle design allows you to get a consistent amount of powder every time. Simply take off the cap, pump, and style. No more making messes with shaker bottles.
QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Our Hair Texturizing Powder is 100% vegan and cruelty free. Made in The United States with no Sulfates, Parabens, or Phthalates. products.product_name: Men’s Rogaine 5% Minoxidil for Men Foam, Clinically Proven Regrowth for Thinning Hair, Topical Hair Loss Treatment, Unscented Topical Aerosol, Results in 8–16 Weeks, 3-Month Supply, 3 x 2.11 oz
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Hair Loss Products > Hair Regrowth Treatments
products.description: Men’s Rogaine minoxidil for men foam is a clinically proven topical aerosol hair regrowth treatment featuring a 5% minoxidil formula to reactivate hair follicles and help regrow fuller, thicker hair. Designed for the early stages of thinning at the vertex (top of the scalp), this unscented minoxidil for men foam leverages Tricho-Prime Technology—a blend of botanical extracts, nourishing emollients, and alpha hydroxy acid (AHA)—to condition and gently exfoliate the scalp, help keep follicles open, and create an optimal environment for hair growth. Clinical studies show noticeable new hair regrowth in 12 weeks with consistent twice-daily use; individual timelines vary, and you may notice early signs between weeks 8–12 with fuller benefits around week 16. Because response can vary, you may experience initial shedding as weaker hairs make way for new growth; maintain consistent application to see the best results over time. To use, dispense approximately half a capful and apply directly to clean, dry thinning areas on the top of the scalp morning and night, gently massaging the product into the skin; allow it to dry completely before styling. The no-mess, quick-absorbing foam integrates seamlessly into daily routines and fits easily into your regular hair care regimen. Each pack provides a 3-month supply with three 2.11 oz bottles to support uninterrupted treatment and routine adherence. As a trusted hair loss treatment for men, this targeted foam penetrates the scalp to stimulate follicle activity and support hair protein production for visible regrowth with continued use. For best results, commit to consistent twice-daily application for at least 4 months to allow new growth to appear and mature; ongoing use is needed to maintain results. Rogaine is the #1 dermatologist-recommended hair growth product brand. If you’re ready to address hereditary hair loss at the vertex, choose the convenience of minoxidil for men foam and start your hair growth journey today.
features: Clinical hair regrowth: Clinically proven to improve hair regrowth by 4x versus control at 16 weeks; unscented topical aerosol foam, 3-month supply, apply half-capful twice daily on scalp to regrow fuller, thicker hair and reverse hereditary hair loss.

Scalp conditioning technology: Tricho-Prime technology with botanical extracts and emollients conditions scalp and keeps follicles open; alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) exfoliates gently to enhance minoxidil absorption and support hair growth products.

Targeted thinning hair treatment: Minoxidil for men foam stimulates hair follicle activity and boosts hair protein production; formulated for men with general thinning at the top of the scalp to promote fuller, denser hair regrowth.

Easy daily application: Unscented, no-mess foam fits seamlessly into your hair care and hair growth routine; this 5% minoxidil topical hair loss treatment applies in a half-capful twice daily on clean, dry scalp for a full 3-month supply.

Brand trust and efficacy: From the #1 dermatologist-recommended Rogaine, this 5% minoxidil foam for men is clinically proven to reverse hereditary hair loss and deliver visible regrowth; scientifically validated in clinical studies.

features: This product is non-sealed

[ OIL FREE NIGHT LOTION ] Use Cerave PM facial lotion as the last step in an evening skincare routine. If layering with an eye cream, moisturizer or facial serum, apply the Cerave night lotion after other product applications have been fully absorbed

[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

This allows you to focus on the nail design without worrying about the risk of shaking or the nail plate falling off the finger deck. The nail tip holder and the heart-shaped nail holders are made of acrylic. These materials make the product more durable and safe to use

products.product_name: Heat Cap for Deep Conditioning: 10-Level Heats Up Quickly 3 Time Settings Hair Steamer for Natural Hair Home Use Thermal Steam Cap for Black Hair Portable Heating Caps
products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Hair Care > Styling Tools & Appliances > Drying Hoods
products.description:
Salon-Quality Results at Home:Our High-Performance Hair Steamer Cap combines flame-retardant material with precise electronic temperature control, giving you professional deep conditioning without leaving your bathroom. Look and feel great while boosting your hair treatment—this heated cap takes your routine to the next level.
Upgraded for Thick, Curly Hair:Our hair steamer for deep conditioning Wider and longer than standard caps, it’s designed to fit thick, curly, or natural hair perfectly. The durable plastic lining (with a balanced double layer) maintains steady heat, while the adjustable cord strap fits any head size. Plus, it’s easy to clean—no hassle, just results.
Safe, Customizable Heat:This deep conditioning hair cap Choose from 10 temperature settings to match your comfort, and 3 timer modes (20-45 minutes) for optimal use. Our smart safety feature kicks in at 65°C (149°F)—it shuts off automatically, then restarts heating when temps drop to 45°C (113°F). Peace of mind, every time.
Deep Conditioning That Works:Prevent breakage and split ends with gentle, consistent heat that opens hair cuticles, helping your conditioner and treatments absorb deeper. The result? Softer, shinier hair that feels healthier from root to tip—ideal for all hair types.
Perfect for Home & Travel:Wide and deep enough to cover roots, ends, and edges, this compact cap fits easily in small spaces at home. Lightweight and portable, it’s also a travel essential—never skip your deep conditioning routine, even on the go.

products.description: Shark FacialPro Glow delivers instant and radiant glow with good-for-your-skin ingredients and FacialPro Glow technology for spa-level results you’ll love. Complete with the Shark DePuffi attachment for instant contrast hot + cold therapy to depuff & soothe.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Creams & Moisturizers > Face Moisturizers
products.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion has an ultra-lightweight, unique formula that moisturizes throughout the night and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II). This night cream is formulated to lock in your skin's moisture and helps restore you skin's natural barrier while you sleep. The formula also contains hyaluronic acid to help retain skin’s natural moisture and niacinamide to help calm skin.
•Suitable for all skin types•Oil-free•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Gentle, non-irritating formula
Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture•Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin
features: This product is non-sealed

[ OIL FREE NIGHT LOTION ] Use Cerave PM facial lotion as the last step in an evening skincare routine. If layering with an eye cream, moisturizer or facial serum, apply the Cerave night lotion after other product applications have been fully absorbed

[ OVERNIGHT MOISTURIZER ] Cerave’s PM face cream contains niacinamide to help calm the skin and uses MVE Technology to deliver hydration throughout the night. It also contains hyaluronic acid to help retain skin's moisture
[ GENTLE ON SKIN ] Fragrance free, paraben-free, oil free, non-comedogenic, and allergy-tested

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Tools & Accessories > Makeup Brushes & Tools > Face > Face Brushes > Kabuki Brushes
products.description:
NO-SHED, VEGAN, HIGH BRISTLE-COUNT MAKEUP BRUSHES: Your makeup application is only as good as the quality of your brush. That's why you'll love this no-shed, high-bristle-count vegan brush that feels luxurious and blends seamlessly.
HIGH QUALITY PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP BRUSHES: A high-quality makeup brush can make all the difference. Case in point: this versatile, retractable Kabuki brush, which can apply foundation, color, highlight, or contour.
TRAVEL FRIENDLY ON-THE GO MAKEUP BRUSH: The Kabuki brush is a desert-island pick for plenty of makeup artists, and for good reason. Great for building coverage with both pressed and loose powders, it's a tool that can work with plenty of different makeup. And the petite, travel-friendly size of this one makes it even more of a must-have.
EVEN, STREAK FREE & PATCH FREE APPLICATION: Swirl or dip the retractable Kabuki brush into powder and gently tap off any excess. Apply to skin using sweeping, circular motions. Slide the base down slightly to apply creams or push it down all the way for powders.
PERFECT FOR LIQUID, CREAM, AND POWDER PRODUCTS:If you only have one brush in your makeup bag, this is the one to have—it works with loose and pressed powders, is a quadruple-threat (use it wiith foundation, color, highlight, or contour), and even packs away easy for travel.

Strong knotting design: The improved version of the loofah adopts special reinforcement and knotting technology, which greatly enhances the firmness and durability of the internal connection of the bath sponge.
Ideal body cleaning set: The exfoliating bath sponge is made of soft PE material, which is strong and not easily deformed. It can gently remove dirt, dead skin, excess oil, and residue from the skin and pores, making the skin softer and smoother.

products.description:
RADIANT BAKED BLUSH: Richly pigmented and highly buildable, the beautiful matte and shimmery shades of Baked Blush are the perfect cheeky pop of color for every skin tone. Shape, contour and highlight your best facial features.
AVAILABLE IN 12 SHADES: Choose from 12 different rosy shades to add a natural shimmer or matte finish to your complexion.
CRUELTY-FREE BEAUTY: This powder blush is formulated with the best ingredients to add a natural glow to your face. Sunbaked on Italian terracotta tiles, the warm finish adds a radiance that is the very essence of beauty. Never tested on animals.
TIPS & TRICKS: Apply with a brush starting at the apple of your cheek and gently swiping up and away. The buildable formula enables you to create a natural or more rosy look.

No matter who you are or where you come from, we're here to fuel your self-expression with makeup for every shade, attitude, and ethnicity. No judgment. No exceptions.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Makeup > Lips > Lip Stains
products.description:
Peel-off lip stain masque that lasts all day. Wonder Blading Peel and Reveal locks in color for a matte nude finish: waterproof, smudge proof so you skip touch-ups through drinks, meals, commutes, and workouts.
Matte nude lip stain and lip tint powered by Wonder Blading technology (Liquid Blading) fuses pigment into the top lip layer for locked-in color—no feathering, fading and budge-free. Long lasting, high-pigment, non-drying, kiss-proof wear with clean edges
1-Step Stain & Go - Achieving a low-maintenance, long-wear look has never been easier with our Lip Stain Masque. Apply the Lip Stain Masque and let it set for 10 - 30 seconds, then wipe away with a damp towel or tissue. You’ll be left with a natural lip stain that won’t budge or fade throughout the day, even when eating or drinking.
Buildable Lip Stain or Lip Liner Stain - Wear it all over for bold color or apply just to the edges as a lip liner stain. Re-apply for more vibrance, then remove easily with any oil-based makeup remover.
13 Universally Flattering Shades - We offer the perfect shade for everyone and every occasion, including nude lip stain, pink lip stain, and even a bold red lip stain. Our lip tints are universally flattering, with soft fresh tints that suit any skin tone. And our lip makeup is designed to last, providing a lip stain long lasting formula that won’t fade or budge throughout the day.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Cleansers > Cloths & Towelettes
products.description: Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes are ultra-soft, alcohol-free, micellar-infused face wipes that gently dissolve makeup, oil, dirt, sweat, sunscreen, and even waterproof mascara in one easy step for clean, fresh-looking skin every day. Each twin pack includes two 25-count packs (50 wipes total) for daily convenience at home or on the go. These makeup remover wipes feature a triple emollient formula that leaves skin feeling refreshed, nourished, and conditioned with no heavy residue and no need to rinse. Designed for sensitive skin and gentle on the delicate eye area, these face cleansing wipes are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist-, and allergy-tested. The wipes are formulated without phthalates, parabens, sulfates, soaps, alcohols, or dyes, making them suitable for all skin types. Perfect for daily routines, travel, or gym bags, these disposable facial wipes and travel makeup wipes provide a quick, effective cleanse anytime. products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Face > Treatments & Masks > Serums
products.description:
The Real Snail Essence: Formulated with 96.3% Snail Secretion Filtrate, this essence repairs and rejuvenates the skin from dryness and aging. It improves skin vitality by reducing dullness and soothing dehydrated skin.
Simple Yet Effective Light-weight Essence: A lightweight essence which fastly absorbs into the skin and gives you a natural and healthy glow. Guarantees long-lasting hydration without heavy feeling on the skin.
Key Ingredient: Snail Secretion Filtrate contains "Mucin"- an EFFECTIVE ingredient for enhanced moisturization. It instantly soothes damaged skin and delivers moisture deep into your skin. Perfect for dehydrated and damaged skin.
NO Snails are Harmed: Snail Mucin is obtained in a safe and environmentally friendly way in a favorite environment of snails and then processed as a cosmetic material. 100% Natural, Hypoallergenic, Dermatologist-tested.
Patch Test Recommended: Based on a Skin Irritation Test and a Human Repeat Insult Patch Test (HRIPT), the Snail 96 Mucin Essence is safe to use on sensitive skin. Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Body > Moisturizers > Body Butters
products.description:
DO IT LIKE GRANDMA DID: Tallow--or rendered beef fat--is ancestral skincare. Our ancestors relied almost solely on animal fats to moisturize, protect, and heal their skin. Enjoy our light, meltable, whipped tallow balm as a contemporary nod to the practice of our forefathers.
ECZEMA "IT" BALM: Tallow is rich in vitamins A,D,E,K and B1 and plentiful fatty acids; while our herb-infused olive oil is high in polyphenols and antioxidants. This yields a balm that is nourishing to your skin and provides a protective barrier that's better than petroleum products as it is both breathable and absorbable. For people who want real results for their eczema, psoriasis, or dry skin, this is your "it" product.
SOURCING: We source our tallow from USA small farmers who practice regenerative agriculture. This means that they rotationally graze their cows all year long, never feeding anything other than grass. These healthy, happy cows create a beautiful, golden yellow fat that contains high levels of vitamins and minerals. Our suet is hand-rendered by our skilled team before it is scent-approved and then used in our tallow formula, crafted by hand in small batches.
MILD, CLEAN AROMA: Some tallow balms out there stink like the dickens. We are proud to offer a tallow that smells only lightly buttery upon opening--not beefy or off-putting. Enjoy clean, natural skincare without smelling like a steak (if that's not what you were looking for...).
ABOUT OUR PROCESS: At Hearth and Homestead, we are a small, family-owned business that holds to high standards for every single ingredient we put in our products. We use only high quality essential oils, butters, fats, herbs, and spices. We never use artificial ingredients like micas, dyes, or artificial fragrances.

products.breadcrumb: Beauty & Personal Care > Skin Care > Eyes > Masks
products.description:
Say goodbye to puffiness and hello to youthful eyes!: The Peptide Collagen Eye Patches, enriched with 4 powerful peptides and collagen, work to reduce puffiness, hydrate, and revitalize your under-eye area, leaving your skin looking refreshed and radiant.
Clinically Tested: Based on Clinical Tests, the Patches were confirmed to help reduce puffiness by 25%, improve hydration by 68%, and improve firmness by 17% on the under eyes with one use. *Eye Irritation and Sensitive Skin Irritation Tested.
Key Ingredients: 4 Peptides, Collagen, Caffeine, Niacinamide, Adenosine, Hyaluronic Acid, and Cyanocobalamin work together to help firm, depuff and provide volume to the under eyes.
How to Use: On clean, dry skin, place the gel eye patches under your eyes and leave on for about 10 minutes. Gently remove, then pat any remaining essence into the skin until fully absorbed. Two ways Usage : 1. Under-eye puffiness & wrinkles : Place the large round end towards your nose. 2. Crow's feet : Place the large round away from your nose.*Tips for Applying: Remove excess essence to prevent from slipping, and gently press patches to secure in place.
Patch Test Recommended: Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

products.description:
GET FULLER, HEALTHIER-LOOKING LASHES & BROWS NATURALLY: Terez & Honor’s Enhancing Eyelash and Brow Serum helps boost the appearance of longer, thicker lashes and brows without the need for false lashes. This drug-free formula is designed to give your lashes and brows a natural, fuller look over time.
SAFE & GENTLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Developed with a blend of science and nature, Terez & Honor's lash growth serum is formulated to be gentle on the skin, making it suitable for all skin types. Many users report visible improvements in lash and brow thickness and length within as little as 6 weeks with consistent use.
STRONGER, HEALTHIER-LOOKING RESULTS: Crafted with high-quality ingredients, this serum is hypoallergenic, clinically tested, and dermatologist-reviewed to ensure both safety and efficacy. It’s an ideal choice for those looking to enhance their natural lashes and brows without irritation.
EASY TO APPLY: Using the precision applicator, apply a thin line of serum along the base of your upper and lower lash line each morning and night, similar to applying eyeliner. For brows, gently apply to clean skin for the best results.
NATURAL & NOURISHING FORMULA: This advanced eyelash and brow serum is packed with nourishing, naturally derived ingredients that support a healthier-looking lash and brow appearance over time.

products.description:
ROSÉ ALL DAY: Our refreshing Patchology Serve Chilled Rosé Under Eye Gel Pads deliver essential hydration and plumping to the under-eye area, adding a luxurious touch to wedding preparation kits. These eye pads are a thoughtful addition for bridesmaid proposal gifts or for anyone who wants to feel pampered before the big day.
POWERED BY ANTIOXIDANTS: Formulated with grape extract (Resveratrol) and strawberry extract, these under-eye patches protect against environmental stressors that can accelerate aging. They make an elegant inclusion in bridal party gifts, bridesmaid proposal sets, or as part of a pre-wedding skincare routine for a polished look.
SOOTHE & GLOW: Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid, our under-eye patches help reduce puffiness, fine lines, and wrinkles by locking in moisture, revealing a refreshed, radiant appearance. Ideal for gift bags, these patches add a special touch to bridal party boxes or self-care kits that the bridal party will appreciate.
STRAWBERRY SCENTED BLISS: Lightly scented with strawberry, these gel patches soften and hydrate in just 5 minutes, providing a quick boost to any skincare regimen. Perfect for bachelorette celebration packs or as an accessory in wedding prep essentials, these eye patches are a convenient way to ensure a revitalized look.
BRIDAL BEAUTY ON THE GO: These easy-to-use patches are perfect for anyone seeking rejuvenation on the go. Great for bridal party members, teens, or personal travel kits, they add a unique touch to bridesmaid care packages or weekend getaway bags. For extra freshness, refrigerate before use to give your bridal party a cooling experience.

Nourishing, Everyday Body Oil: A lightweight, vitamin-infused blend of plant-derived oils that hydrates and softens skin without a greasy feel. Perfect for use during pregnancy, postpartum, or as part of your daily body-care routine.
Botanical Oil Blend: Formulated with sunflower, apricot, olive, and shea butter oils to comfort dry, tight, or stretching skin and support a smoother, more supple feel.
Deep, Long-Lasting Hydration: Absorbs quickly to replenish moisture and leave skin feeling soft, silky, and replenished—ideal for belly, hips, thighs, and anywhere that needs extra nourishment.
Gentle & Pregnancy Safe: Made for sensitive, changing skin with a clean formula that’s paraben-free and dermatologist tested. Safe for daily use before, during, and after pregnancy.
Supports Skin Elasticity: Helps keep skin feeling flexible and resilient as it stretches, promoting a healthier, more comfortable skin appearance over time.

products.description:
Snail 96% Peptide Booster Serum: The famous Snail 96 Essence, but with a boost! Boost all benefits of the Snail 96 Essence with the Peptide Booster Toner.
The Real Snail Essence: Formulated with 96.3% Snail Secretion Filtrate, this essence repairs and rejuvenates the skin from dryness and aging. It improves skin vitality by reducing dullness and soothing dehydrated skin.
Skin Booster Peptide Toner Serum: Skin Boosting Toner Serum with 6 Peptides that improve skin elasticity, fine lines, pores, and radiance. Boost your skin's condition and achieve multiple benefits with this toner.
How to Use: 1. After cleansing, apply 2-3 pumps of the Peptide Booster Serum and gently pat to aid absorption. 2. Apply 2-3 pumps of the Snail 96 Essence. 3. Finish up with your favorite mosturizer if needed.
Patch Test Recommended: Perform a Patch Test on the body before using on the face. Proceed to using on the face if no irritation occurs in 24 hours. Consult with your doctor immediately if irritation occurs.

products.description:
ORIGINAL SPF 50 SUNSCREEN SPRAY . This is the stuff we use every day. The sunscreen that started it all and smells like summer. We wanted a sunscreen to protect those who live and love in the sun, so we made it
MOISTURIZING SUN PROTECTION. Dermatologist and Sonny approved, this non-comedogenic sunscreen delivers UVA/UVB protection and is packed with Vitamin E. Our water-resistant and Hawaii 104 Act Compliant SPF 50 Spray is great for all skin types
HOW TO USE. 15 minutes before sun exposure, apply liberally to all areas of the skin and avoid the eye area. For best results, reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating. Sonny's Tip: Apply every 2 hours for maximum sun protection
PROTECT YOUR SKIN. The key to practicing safe sun is to protect and moisturize your skin. Our Original Sunscreen line is Oxybenzone, Octinoxate, Gluten, Cruelty and Paraben Free to ensure a fun day in the sun
TRUST THE BUM. What does that mean? It means trust us, the ones who live on the beach and need products that work on the most intense days in the sun. The simple truth is, when you make products to protect the ones you love, you make ‘em better

products.description:
CHAPPED LIP TREATMENT: Specially formulated for all types of chapped lips. Cortibalm helps heal mild to severe chapped lips due to harsh weather, allergies, cold sores, cosmetics, medications, (Accutane and Chemotherapy) eczema, lip licking, mouth breathing and more.
REPAIR & NOURISH LIPS: This treatment contains 1% hydrocortisone which interrupts the inflammatory cycle, stops the pain and allows the natural healing process to begin.
ORIGINAL LIP CARE PRODUCTS: Cortibalm is a mild hypoallergenic blend free of harsh chemicals, additives, flavors and colorings. These ingredients found in ordinary lip balms often irritate and prevent healing.
ECONOMICAL USE: Highly effective! Within 24 hours of application you will see and feel the results that other lip balms failed to deliver. Once healed use Dr. Dan's All Natural Lip Balm!
DISCOVER CORTIBALM: Dr. Dan's lip care is a simple blend of beeswax, petroleum jelly, mineral oil and 1 % hydrocortisone. Less is more!

products.description:
24-HOUR MOISTURE LIP MASK: eos Lip Balms use cocoa, shea, and avocado butters to condition and protect, making them a great option as an overnight lip balm or for use during the day
LIP CARE PRODUCTS MADE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Our Dermatologist-recommended lip balm is formulated for sensitive skin and hypoallergenic
SUSTAINABLY-SOURCED SKINCARE INGREDIENTS: eos lip balms have wild grown, sustainably sourced natural shea butter and oil to leave your lips smooth and nourished, making it a suitable overnight lip mask
HONEY APPLE FLAVORED LIP BALM: This eos lip balm tastes like fresh-picked apples, straight from the orchard
OUR PROMISE: All eos moisturizing lip balms are paraben, phthalate, gluten, and cruelty-free
